verses.roman:
āpane ācare keha, nā kare pracāra
pracāra karena keha, nā karena ācāra

synonyms: āpane—personally; ācare—behaves; keha—someone; nā kare pracāra—does not do preaching work; pracāra karena—does preaching work; keha—someone; nā karena ācāra—does not behave strictly according to the principles.
translation: "Some behave very well but do not preach the cult of Kṛṣṇa consciousness, whereas others preach but do not behave properly.
